title: Item Texture Atlas
description: The item_texture.json file defines the texture atlas for item textures. It maps texture names to texture file paths, allowing items to reference textures by name. Located at textures/item_texture.json in resource packs.

tokens.text: maps item texture names to their file paths in the atlas

fields.title: Resource Pack Name
fields.description: The name of the resource pack this atlas belongs to.

fields.title: Texture Name
fields.description: The name of the texture atlas. Typically 'atlas.items' for item textures.

fields.title: Padding
fields.description: The padding in pixels between textures in the atlas to prevent bleeding.

fields.title: Number of Mip Levels
fields.description: The number of mipmap levels to generate for the atlas.

fields.title: Texture Data
fields.description: A collection of texture definitions keyed by texture name. Each entry maps a texture name to its source file(s).

subForm.title: Texture Entry
subForm.description: Defines a texture that can be referenced by items.

fields.title: Textures
fields.description: Array of texture file paths. Multiple paths can be provided for variants (used with aux values in older versions).
